db:abstract.db:para: Represents a button in a thumbnail toolbar.
This type was introduced in QtWinExtras 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The ThumbnailToolButton represents a button in a thumbnail toolbar.

db:section.db:title: dismissOnClick : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the window thumbnail is dismissed after a button click.
By default, this property is set to false.

db:section.db:title: enabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is enabled.
By default, this property is set to true.

db:section.db:title: flat : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button background and frame are not drawn.
By default, this property is set to false.

db:section.db:title: interactive : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is interactive. If not interactive, the button remains enabled, but no pressed or mouse-over states are drawn. Set this property to false to use this button as a notification icon.
By default, this property is set to true.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the button is visible.
By default, this property is set to true.

db:section.db:title: clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user clicks the button. The corresponding handler is onClicked.
